title: Sooty's Christmas party and other stories
brief_description: Sooty, Sweep and Soo have a splendid time at Christmas. They arrange a party with their friends and have lots of presents. Father Christmas makes an appearance in a most unlikely place! “Royalty” Sooty and his friends are visited by “royalty”. “Get your skates on” Sooty and his friends go ice skating. Written and presented by Matthew Corbett.
